thread.title: Chuck Todd Responds to ‘Enemy’ Tweet: ‘The President’s Problems Aren’t a Media Fabrication’
thread.title_full: Chuck Todd Responds to ‘Enemy’ Tweet: ‘The President’s Problems Aren’t a Media Fabrication’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Chuck Todd Responds to ‘Enemy’ Tweet: ‘The President’s Problems Aren’t a Media Fabrication’
text:
Chuck Todd Responds to ‘Enemy’ Tweet: ‘The President’s Problems Aren’t a Media Fabrication’ by Josh Feldman | 5:23   
Chuck Todd opened today’s MTP Daily by saying, “I don’t believe any American is the enemy of any other American.” 
Todd was reacting to this tweet this afternoon from President Trump : The FAKE NEWS media (failing @nytimes , @NBCNews , @ABC , @CBS , @CNN ) is not my enemy, it is the enemy of the American People! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 17, 2017 
Todd said that a lot of “uncomfortable issues facing this president” are being overlooked with distractions. 
He stated that “the president’s problems aren’t a media fabrication” and ran a scroll of said problems. 
When Todd brought his panel on to discuss Trump’s war with the press yesterday, he remarked, “Press Secretary Donald Trump did his job, didn’t he?” 
Watch above, via MSNBC.
